Class PlanningTestHelper

Helper class to recipe instantiation and replanning. Usage example: let helper = await TestHelper.createAndPlan({manifestFilename: 'my.manifest'}); await helper.acceptSuggestion({particles: ['MyParticle1', 'MyParticle2']}); await helper.verifyData('MyParticle1', 'myHandle1', async (handle) => { ... });

acceptSuggestion

  • acceptSuggestion(options?: object): Promise<void>
    • Defined in planning/testing/planning-test-helper.ts:113

    Accepts a suggestion. |options| may provide the exact list of particles representing the suggestion to accept. Otherwise, fallback to a single generated suggestion, if appropriate.

    Parameters

    • Optional options: object
      • Optional descriptionText?: string
      • Optional hostedParticles?: string[]
      • Optional particles?: string[]

    Returns Promise<void>

makePlans

  • makePlans(options?: TestHelperPlanOptions): Promise<PlanningTestHelper>
    • Defined in planning/testing/planning-test-helper.ts:69

    Generates suggestions for the arc. |options| contains possible verifications to be performed on the generated plans:

    • expectedNumPlans: (optional) number of expected number of generated suggestions to verify.
    • expectedSuggestions: (optional) list of expected description texts representing the generated suggestion.
    • verify: a handler method to be called to verify the resulting suggestions.

    Parameters

    • Optional options: TestHelperPlanOptions

    Returns Promise<PlanningTestHelper>
